column4: "Minyim dɛ ɔwo itum adze nyinara yɛ
column5: Na dɛ wo tsirmpɔw biara worunntum nnsiw no kwan."

column2: "Woana nye nyia onnyi nyimdzee ntsi ɔpow afotu yi? Dɛm ntsi na meka dza menntse ase yi
column3: Ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ nwanwa dodow ma me a minnyim."

column2: "Ɔnam asowa ne ntsee nko do na metsee wo nka; Na afei dze m'enyiwa tua wo."

column3: na munu moho Wɔ dɛtse na nso mu."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ EWURADZE kaa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ Job n'ekyir no
column4: Mo bo efuw ɔwo na w'anyɛnkofo beenu no: osiandɛ hom annka mo ho asɛm a ɔtsen

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom mfa anantwinyin esuon na nguannyin esuon
column3: na hom nkɔ m'akowaa Job nkyɛn
column4: na hom nkɔbɔ hyew afɔr mma homho: na m'akowaa Job mbɔ hom tsir do mpaa; na ɔno na mebɛpen no
column5: ama menye hom eenndzi dɛ mbrɛ hom nkwaseasɛm tse; osiandɛ hom annka mo ho asɛm a ɔtsen

column2: "Nna Temannyi Elifaz na Suhinyi Bildad na Naamatnyi Zofar sii mu kɔree kɛyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ hɔn no: na EWURADZE tsiee Job."
"Na aber a Job bɔɔ n'anyɛnkofo no hɔn tsir mpaa no
column3: EWURADZE daan no ndɔmmumyɛ no: na EWURADZE maa Job adze dodow a nkyɛ ɔwɔ no mbɔho ebien."

column4: na hɔn a nkyɛ wɔyɛ n'anyɛnkofo no nyinara
column6: na wɔnye no bedzidzii wɔ ne fie: na wogyaam no
column7: na wɔkyekyee no werɛ wɔ mbusu a EWURADZE maa ɔbaa no do no nyinara ho: nyimpa biara so maa no sika

column2: "Nna EWURADZE hyiraa Job n'ewiei ma ɔseen n'ahyɛse: na onyaa nguan mpemduanan
"Onyaa mbabanyin beesuon na mbabaa baasa so."

column3: ɔfrɛɛ nyia odzi kan no Jemima; nyia otsia ebien no Kezia; na nyia otsia ebiasa no so Keren-hapuk."

column2: "Na woennhu mbaa a hɔn ho yɛ fɛw dɛ Job ne mbabaa no wɔ asaase no nyinara do: na hɔn egya memaa hɔn egyapadze wɔ hɔn nuanom mu."
"Na yi ekyir no Job dzii mfe ɔha eduanan
column4: na ne mba so hɔn mba

column3: nna ɔayɛ akɔdaa a oedzi mfe pii."
